page.text: B R I A H U N T E R
O B J E C T I V E
Motivated, creative student seeking experience in the world of copywriting, combining a strong attention to detail with
a big-picture view, and utilizing a creative, curious mind to create innovative content.
E X P E R I E N C E
C O P Y W R I T E R I N T E R N , I N B O U N D I F Y, C H A R L O T T E , N C (
J A N - A U G
• Created website copy including landing pages and descriptions of marketing services
• Wrote copy for consumer communications material for marketing clients, including emails and ebooks
• Collaborated with other copywriters to produce an informative and comprehensive ebook for agency clients
describing services available
F A S H I O N C O P Y W R I T E R , B E L L A F A S H I O N , H AY WA R D , C A 2 0 1 2 - 2 0 1 3
• Created engaging promotional press releases announcing new products and timely company developments
• Researched and wrote blog posts on fashion accessories in a customer-focused manner, illustrating product benefits
and tips
• Created informative website copy for the "About Us" website section to describe the history and values of the
company.
S C H O O L N E W S P A P E R E D I T O R , H O G A N H I G H S C H O O L , VA L L E J O , C A
• Managed article submissions from newspaper staff of 25-30
• Edited copy, offering suggestions and maintaining accuracy in articles
• Wrote and proposed audience-focused ideas for news and features articles
E D U C A T I O N
U N I V E R S I T Y O F C A L I F O R N I A , B E R K E L E Y - B E R K E L E Y, C A J U L Y 2 0 1 3 -
Degree: Bachelor of Arts in Media Studies with a minor in Creative Writing , awarded with highest honors
S O L A N O C O M M U N I T Y C O L L E G E - VA L L E J O , C A J A N . 2 0 1 2 - J U N E 2 0 1 3
Objective : Complete general education/major prep requirements and transfer to the California university system for
a degree in the writing field.
H O G A N H I G H S C H O O L , VA L L E J O , C A - S A L U T A T O R I A N ( G P A : 4 . 1 6 )
G R A D U A T I O N D A T E : J U N E 9 T H , 2 0 1 1
S K I L L S
Written communication skills. Ability to work in a team or independently. Efficient and high-quality turnaround on
independent assignments. Knowledge of Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator and word processing. Planning and organizational
skills. Ability to take direction.
136 Begonia Court, Vallejo, CA 94591
